answers.answer: I can't answer all your questions, but I do have adhesions on my tubes and I am currently 12 weeks pregnant. For me it was a lot of prayer and faith that made it work. Hope you get what you are looing for!

as far as i'm aware adhesions can't disappear, i had adhesions cut away in April 2010 and was told they wouldn't grow back as i've heard this happens to some people, i also had a twisted tube which the doctor untwisted to help me conceive a little better although i pnly have a 5% chance of coneiving on my own, the best chance i have is IVF.How many attempts of IVF have you had?  was there anything wrong with your womb or just your tubes?  i've been told my success rate through IVF is really high because there is nothing wrong with my womb only my tubes.  I wish you loads of luck and hope you have a chance of conceiving soon :)

sorry if I sound illogical or hypothetical.. but I wanted to share my experiences and beliefs...I am a believer in yoga and natural medicine.. The fact that our ENTIRE BODY was created out of a single cell when we were conceived in our mom's womb.. is proof enough that our body has an inherent capability and information about how to fix diseases... given a chance and a triggerI have seen natural/homeopathic medicine helping regrow bones which dissolved due to diabetes,  cartilages and spinal disks which were damaged.. regeneration of liver, shrinkage of an enlarged aortic valve in the heart.. increased E/F ratio for cardiac patients.. and seen so many women get cured of gynac troubles.. I have myself seen the effect of these techniques on my fibroids, cysts and irregular cycles...In a nutshell..  more than the allopathic medicines, it is prayer, belief, yoga and natural medicine that I believe in...Its worth the research :) Hope it helps you as well...

question: i have had 20 plus surgerys hysteroscopys,laparoscopies,laparotomy,cystectomy,appedectomy,the list goes on,.i am after some answers i have suffered for 20 years been told my tubes are blocked and left kinked up and connected to pelvic wall 10 years ago i have also been told written docter reports i have ashesions scar tissue and dysfuctional bleeding and im infertile been through ivf been through lots of procedures.what my biggest question is can my fallopian tube unblock and straighten by itself and go back to normal????and can adhesions and scar tissue miracle dissapear????????please help me as i need to no if it is even a little bit possible.........thanks so much people
title: can any one answer me honestly i am new
